rows.label: tlk43200142_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey! Listen up, you! You'd like to learn
about the skills a Blade needs when
you're out in the field, wouldn't you?

rows.label: tlk43200142_01_msg0002
rows.name:
You want a Blade with useful skills
like Lockpicking or Keen Eye! Not
many Blades like that, see!

rows.label: tlk43200142_01_msg0003
rows.name:
If you find a Blade like that,
never let it go, my lad!

rows.label: tlk43200142_01_msg0004
rows.name:
That's what my old man's
always saying lately.

rows.label: tlk43200142_01_msg0005
rows.name:
You need to cram as many factoids
like that into your brain as you
can, if you wanna be a great Driver.
